Name: CarouselView
Description: A horizontally or vertically scrolling items presenter with snapping and paging.

Properties.Name: ItemsLayout
Properties.Description: Layout used to present items (typically LinearItemsLayout).

Properties.Name: Loop
Properties.Description: Whether the carousel wraps from last to first.

Properties.Name: PeekAreaInsets
Properties.Description: Amount of adjacent items peeking into view.

Helpers.Description: Assigns the items layout child (e.g., LinearItemsLayout).
Sets peeking insets with animation support.
